item.description:
Anyone up and ready for a fun night of dancing????

Let's go to Pourhouse, they have a awesome DJ, great dance floor
It's gets packed sometimes but what do you expect, it's a great club!!!!

So get dressed up, your club shoes on and get ready for a fun night of dancing

Best of all, NO COVER :-)


Hope to see you all out on the dance floor.


103 Allyn St
Hartford, CT 06103


*Might have a few people over beforehand, to pre game*
item.name: Club in Hartford
